Name: Nova's Stasis Shell
Description: Nova is recovering within this stasis shell.

Root.Tooltip: Sends constructed units to the designated point. Workers rallied to resources will begin gathering automatically.
Root.Name: Set Rally Point

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to fire at will. They will engage enemy units within range and chase them as normal.
Root.Name: Weapons Free

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 9.
Root.Name: Tac Nuke Strike and Holo Decoy

Root.Tooltip:
Deploys a holographic duplicate of Nova that automatically attacks enemy units. The holo decoy lasts for 60 seconds.

Can only be used in Assault Mode.
Root.Name: Holo Decoy

Root.Tooltip:
Deals 200 damage to target enemy ground or air unit from long range.
Can target biological and mechanical units.
Root.Name: Snipe

Root.Tooltip: Deals 50 (100 vs Light) damage to enemy ground units in a wide arc.Does not damage friendly units.
Root.Name: Penetrating Blast

Root.Tooltip: Deploys an undetectable explosive drone that deals 200 damage (+200 vs. structures) to enemy ground units in the target area.
Root.Name: Sabotage Drone

Root.Tooltip:
Teleports Nova to a nearby target location. Nova gains a temporary shield that absorbs up to 200 damage for 8 seconds.

Ability regains a charge every 8 seconds. Can store a maximum of 3 charges.
Root.Name: Blink

Root.Tooltip: Allows Nova to remain permanently cloaked.
Root.Name: Tactical Stealth Suit

Root.Tooltip: Increases Nova's movement speed and allows her to use Blink. Nova cannot cloak while this armor is equipped.
Root.Name: Phase Reactor Suit

Root.Tooltip: Grants Nova detection, allowing her to see and track cloaked and burrowed enemy units.
Root.Name: Ghost Visor

Root.Tooltip:
Calls down a Nuclear Strike at the target location, dealing 600 damage in a large radius after 5 seconds.

Does not damage friendly units or structures.
Root.Name: Tac Nuke Strike

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 9.
Root.Name: Tac Nuke Strike and Holo Decoy

Root.Tooltip: Increases Nova's movement speed and allows her to use Penetrating Blast and Blink.Equips Nova to attack ground units within a wide arc.
Root.Name: Assault Mode

Root.Tooltip: Permanently cloaks Nova and allows her to use Snipe and Sabotage Drone.</n></n><C val="#ColorAttackInfo">Equips Nova to attack air and ground units.
Root.Name: Stealth Mode

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 3.
Root.Name: Assault Mode

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 8.
Root.Name: Caduceus Reactor

Root.Tooltip: Increases Nova's life regeneration rate.
Root.Name: Caduceus Reactor

Root.Tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of Stealth Mode and Assault Mode by 15 seconds. Nova gains maximum energy when switching modes.</n></n>Switching to Stealth Mode grants temporary invulnerability and switching to Assault Mode grants a temporary bonus to damage dealt.
Root.Name: Stance Dance

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 15.
Root.Name: Stance Dance
